resources.string: This application has been divided into 8 parts. Each of them corresponds to a different part of the preparation of your wedding. Let\'s get started!
In this section are included all main tasks that you should do in first place.
Write down most important data you would like to have in your invitation.
Your guest list. Select checkboxes if guests confirm there arrival, after that you will have complete guest list that will show at your weeding.
What is your budget for this wedding? Add the expenses that await you. All important payment terms will be added into your Calendar.
Connect to your Google calendar. It will contain important dates of tasks like confirmations or payment terms.
Checkboxes for important documents that you have to have on your big day.
Text field to summarize the order of activities on the day of the wedding.
This are your main tasks for your wedding. Fill them up and be ready for your big day.
Right here you can write important things about your invitations.
Go head and fill this text field.
Reserve the date of the ceremony
This is date of your ceremony:
Here you can add guest to your guest list. Click button and add your first guest.
